The High-Performance  
Vector Database Built for Scale
======================================================

Milvus is an open-source vector database built for GenAI applications. Install with pip, perform high-speed searches, and scale to tens of billions of vectors with minimal performance loss.

[Milvus Quickstart](https://milvus.io/docs/quickstart.md)[Try Managed Milvus](https://cloud.zilliz.com/signup?utm_source=partner&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=2025-03-05_center&__hstc=175614333.b48e5defee85aeb78b0635b0828f35aa.1741500558229.1741500558229.1741500558229.1&__hssc=175614333.1.1741500558229&__hsfp=2836145088)

Start running Milvus in seconds
-------------------------------

*   Create Collection
*   Insert Data
*   Search
*   Delete Data

```
from pymilvus import MilvusClient
client = MilvusClient("milvus_demo.db")
client.create_collection(
  collection_name="demo_collection",
  dimension=5
)
```

Deployment Options to Match Your Unique Journey
-----------------------------------------------

*   ### Milvus Lite
    
    Lightweight, easy to start
    
    1.  VectorDB-as-a-library runs in notebooks/ laptops with a pip install
    2.  Best for learning and prototyping
    
    [Get Started](https://milvus.io/docs/milvus_lite.md)[Learn More](https://milvus.io/docs/install-overview.md#Milvus-Lite)
    
*   ### Milvus Standalone
    
    Robust, single-machine deployment
    
    1.  Complete vector database for production or testing
    2.  Ideal for datasets with up to millions of vectors
    
    [Get Started](https://milvus.io/docs/prerequisite-docker.md)[Learn More](https://milvus.io/docs/install-overview.md#Milvus-Standalone)
    
*   ### Milvus Distributed
    
    Scalable, enterprise-grade solution
    
    1.  Highly reliable and distributed vector database with comprehensive toolkit
    2.  Scale horizontally to handle billions of vectors
    
    [Get Started](https://milvus.io/docs/prerequisite-helm.md)[Learn More](https://milvus.io/docs/install-overview.md#Milvus-Distributed)
    
*   ### [Zilliz Cloud (fully managed Milvus)](https://zilliz.com/cloud/?__hstc=175614333.b48e5defee85aeb78b0635b0828f35aa.1741500558229.1741500558229.1741500558229.1&__hssc=175614333.1.1741500558229&__hsfp=2836145088)
    
    Hassle-free and 10x faster than Milvus
    
    1.  Available in both serverless and dedicated cluster
    2.  SaaS and BYOC options for different security and compliance requirements
    
    [Try Free](https://cloud.zilliz.com/signup?utm_source=partner&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=2025-03-07_homepage_middle-milvusio&__hstc=175614333.b48e5defee85aeb78b0635b0828f35aa.1741500558229.1741500558229.1741500558229.1&__hssc=175614333.1.1741500558229&__hsfp=2836145088)

Learn more about different [Milvus deployment models](https://milvus.io/docs/install-overview.md)

Loved by GenAI developers
-------------------------

*   [Based on our research, Milvus was selected as the vector database of choice (over Chroma and Pinecone). Milvus is an open-source vector database designed specifically for similarity search on massive datasets of high-dimensional vectors. ![Image 18: Nandula Asel](https://milvus.io/images/home/nandula.png) Nandula Asel Senior Data Scientist ![Image 19: Medium](https://milvus.io/images/home/medium.png)](https://medium.com/@dialoglk/asimov-leveraging-rag-models-for-enhanced-efficiency-in-the-telecommunications-engineering-domain-f220fc405571)
*   [With its focus on efficient vector similarity search, Milvus empowers you to build robust and scalable image retrieval systems. Whether youâ€™re managing a personal photo library or developing a commercial image search application, Milvus offers a powerful foundation for unlocking the hidden potential within your image collections. ![Image 20: Bhargav Mankad](https://milvus.io/images/home/bhargav.png) Bhargav Mankad Senior Solution Architect ![Image 21: Medium](https://milvus.io/images/home/medium.png)](https://medium.com/ibm-data-ai/image-retrieval-with-ibm-watsonx-data-f4bdd1ec1824)
*   [Milvus is a powerful vector database tailored for processing and searching extensive vector data. It stands out for its high performance and scalability, rendering it perfect for machine learning, deep learning, similarity search tasks, and recommendation systems. ![Image 22: Igor Gorbenko](https://milvus.io/images/home/igor.png) Igor Gorbenko Big Data Architect ![Image 23: Medium](https://milvus.io/images/home/medium.png)](https://python.plainenglish.io/harmony-in-data-the-music-recommendation-system-with-milvus-c9711609ed36)

Why Developers Prefer Milvus for Vector Databases
-------------------------------------------------

*   ![Image 48: Scale as needed](https://milvus.io/images/home/scale-as-needed.png)
    
    #### Scale as needed
    
    Scale elastically to support tens of billions of vectors with a fully distributed
    
*   ![Image 49: Blazing fast](https://milvus.io/images/home/blazing-fast.png)
    
    #### Blazing fast
    
    Retrieve data quickly and accurately with Global Index, regardless of scale.
    
*   ![Image 50: Reusable Code](https://milvus.io/images/home/reusable-code.png)
    
    #### Reusable Code
    
    Write once, and deploy with one line of code into the production environment.
    
*   ![Image 51: Supportive Community](https://milvus.io/images/home/vibrant-community.png)
    
    #### Supportive Community
    
    Fan-favorite vector database with extensive resources and supportive contributors.
    
*   ![Image 52: Feature-rich](https://milvus.io/images/home/feature-rich.png)
    
    #### Feature-rich
    
    Metadata filtering, hybrid search, multi-vector and more.
